Text.Page:
Adria has more information on Elleon, Leander's older brother.

A few people have seen him, but the consensus is that he's gone off in search of something.

I've received information about Elleon, . The "Federation's Hero" has gone missing, again.

His brother Leander is worried, and is asking for your help.

Elleon, my brother, has gone missing. Most likely he is chasing some perceived threat to the federation, but his reasons are known to none.

Assembling a picture of his movements might reveal his motives, if not his location. Taras is the last guard to have seen Elleon. Speak to him, and follow any leads he provides.

Elleon's missing again? You know, now that you mention it, I did see him a couple hours ago. He was headed down to the Southern Checkpoint.

He said something about ghilliedhus...I didn't quite catch it. But it never hurts to take a few out, so you might as well kill a few on your way there, eh?

Elleon? Yes, I saw that one heading south. I thought it was a little strange, as that campsite is currently abandoned, but I assumed he had his reasons. It was a few hours ago.

Elleon has been...distracted lately. Honestly, {@linkcreature:213#1008$$Leander} probably has a much better idea of what's going on than I. "Understood."

The details of our interaction are in this report. {@linkcreature:213#1008$$Leander} may glean some greater meaning from it. You should go to him as soon as possible.

And should any sporewalkers impede your passage, I believe you know what to do...

Hmm. Elleon appears to be searching for something. As you may have heard, he does that from time to time.

If it is an official mission, Councilor {@linkcreature:64#1009$$Teil} probably has more insight into his actions.

Yes, I know what Elleon was looking for. Or at least, I know what he told me. He believes a conspiracy is targeting the Island of Dawn.

I'm preparing a report on the matter, but we'll need more than just his word to sell that theory.

I'm approving you for detached duty to investigate.
